definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 32:33 sinew (NH id., Aram. [[גִּידָא]], jodo0; cf. Ar. jiydun neck)—cstr. [[גִּיד]] Ge 32:33, Ge 32:33, Is 48:4; pl. [[גִּידִים]] Job 10:11, Ez Eze 37:6, [[גִּדִים]] Ez Eze 37:8; cstr. [[גִּידֵי]] Job 40:17; —sinew, in general of human body, ‖[[בשׂר]], [[עור]], [[עחמות]], Job 10:11 cf. Ez Eze 37:6, Eze 37:8 of thigh Ge 32:32 (of beast) v:Ge 32:32; iron sinew, fig. of obstinacy, Is 48:4 [[בַּרְזֶל עָרְפֶָּךָ וּמִחְחֲךָ נְחוּשָׁה]] ´[[וג]]; of hippopot., [[פחדו]] ´[[ג]], i.e. of his loins, Job 40:17.
